amendment.description: Page 45, after "$1,000,000,000," insert "and in addition $2,000,000,000 which is hereby transferred from unobligated amounts provided ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to appropriate by transfer, $2,000,000,000 to programs in the heading State and Local Programs.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Clarke (MI) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Clarke (MI).
